title: Ode To My Joy:  A Bad Girl Gone Good
description: "Ode To My Joy" is a fictional story about a bad girl who, thru various adventures and antics, finds the love of her life. Joss is a friendly, somewhat socially-awkward woman. She’s impulsive, and likes to get her way. These attributes sometimes get her into trouble. Most of the time she’s fine with that. She discovers a love of motorcycles, finds a super cool boyfriend, and gets introduced to anal sex, all with a good attitude. At least she thinks so.
author: Tassa Desalada
